batch.description: Date of the data included in the batch.
batch.$comment: Batches are processed after the day ends at midnight, in the location’s local timezone. The first processed batch includes all historical data.

location.$comment: A human-readable, unique id for the location, using kebab case . This value is used externally, such as on booking websites. In rare cases it may change if there is business re-branding.

location timezone.$comment: Location's local timezone which can be used to convert UTC date-time properties.

account id.$comment: An account is the hierarchical parent of a location. In rare cases, the location-to-account relationship may change, such as when business ownership transfers.

payment created at.description: Timestamp of when the payment was created.

payment method.description: Method used to perform a charge transaction.
payment method.$comment: Payment method of a refund will be populated with the original method used for the charge.

payment refund method.description: Method used to perform a refund transaction.

transaction id.$comment: A payment will have at least one charge transaction. If a payment pays two invoices then it will have two charge transactions. If a charge transaction is refunded then it will have a refund transaction. Refunds can be completed in partial amounts.

transaction created at.description: Timestamp of when the transaction was created.

transaction updated at.description: Timestamp of when the transaction was updated.

transaction tip.$comment: Tip amounts can be realocated after transaction creation.

transaction channel.description: Channel where the transaction was created.

transaction terminal.description: Payment terminal used to perform the transaction.
transaction terminal.$comment: Will be populated for a card present charge.

transaction note.description: Location provided description for the transaction.

transaction source id.description: Identifier (system) of the wallet or credit that the transaction was charged from.
transaction source id.$comment: Will be populated when payment method is wallet or credit.

transaction destination id.description: Identifier (system) of the wallet or credit that the transaction was redunded to.
transaction destination id.$comment: Will be populated when payment refund method is wallet or credit.

payment refusal reason.description: Reason for payment refusal by the card processor.

collection-changes.description: Records all payment- and transaction-related changes associated with invoices and bookings.

batch.description: Date of the data included in this batch.
batch.$comment: Batches are processed after the day ends at midnight, in the location’s local timezone. The first processed batch includes all historical data.

location.$comment: A human-readable, unique id for the location, using kebab case . This value is used externally, such as on booking websites. In rare cases it may change if there is business re-branding.

location timezone.$comment: Location's local timezone which can be used to convert UTC date-time properties.

account id.$comment: An account is the hierarchical parent of a location. In rare cases, the location-to-account relationship may change, such as when business ownership transfers.

booking reference.description: Human readable reference for the booking.

booking confirmed at.description: Timestamp of when the booking was confirmed.

booking updated at.description: Timestamp of when the booking was last updated.
booking updated at.$comment: A booking will be updated when the status of one of its invoices changes.

booking status.$comment: Partially canceled is when at least one Invoice in the booking is not canceled. When all of the booking's invoices are canceled then the booking will be canceled.

booking service name.$comment: Location configurable name for of one of Goose's supported services. The booking service name can differ from the invoices contained within the booking.

booking channel.description: Channel where the booking was confirmed.

order device.description: Type of device used to confirm the booking.

invoice reference.description: Human readable reference for the invoice.

invoice created at.description: Timestamp of when the invoice was created.
invoice created at.$comment: Invoices created at the time of booking will have a created at near to the booking confirmed at (within milliseconds). Invoices can be added to a booking after its confirmation.

invoice updated at.description: Timestamp of when the invoice was updated.

invoice sub status.description: Sub status of the invoice used to represent its workflow following booking confirmation.
invoice sub status.$comment: Requested, scheduled and delinced sub statuses are present in services that use scheduling (grooming). Booked sub status is the non-canceled status used for services that do not use scheduling (boarding, daycare and evaluation). In progress and completed sub statuses represent a visit's completion status. Purchased sub status is used for purchase category invoices. Canceled can apply to visit and purchase category invoices.

invoice category.$comment: Visit is a service where the pet arrives and departs. Purchase is for a digital service.

invoice service name.$comment: Location configurable name for of one of Goose's supported services. The invoice service name can differ from the service name of the booking it is contained wihtin.

invoice start.description: Scheduled arrival date of the invoice.
invoice start.$comment: Will be present for Visit Invoices.

invoice planned arrival time.description: Scheduled arrival time of the invoice.
invoice planned arrival time.$comment: Optionally present for Visit Invocies depending on whether it was gathered by the Location.

invoice end.description: Scheduled departure date of the invoice.
invoice end.$comment: Will be present for Visit Invoices.

invoice planned departure time.description: Scheduled departure time of the invoice.
invoice planned departure time.$comment: Optionally present for Visit Invocies depending on whether it was gathered by the Location.

invoice total.$comment: Aggregation of all of the invoice's item total amounts.

invoice net paid.description: Total amount collected for the invoice net of refunds.
invoice net paid.$comment: Sum of charge and refund transactions for the invoice.

invoice refunded.description: Total amount refunded for the invoice.
invoice refunded.$comment: Sum of refund transactions for the invoice.

invoice amount due.description: Amount remaining to be collected for the invoice.
invoice amount due.$comment: Invoice total less invoice net paid.

invoice-changes.description: Captures updates to invoices, bookings, and their statuses, including financial and scheduling details.

batch.description: Date of the data included in this batch.
batch.$comment: Batches are processed after the day ends at midnight, in the location’s local timezone. The first processed batch includes all historical data.

location.$comment: A human-readable, unique id for the location, using kebab case . This value is used externally, such as on booking websites. In rare cases it may change if there is business re-branding.

location timezone.$comment: Location's local timezone which can be used to convert UTC date-time properties.

account id.$comment: An account is the hierarchical parent of a location. In rare cases, the location-to-account relationship may change, such as when business ownership transfers.

item parent id.$comment: Exists in a discounting situation, will contain the item id that this item was used to discount.

item created at.description: Timestamp of when the item was created.

item updated at.description: Timestamp of when the item was updated.

item type.description: Type of item in the invoice.

item subtype.description: Subtype of item in the invoice.
item subtype.$comment: Arrival fee and departure fee subtypes are used for addition type records. Unlimited benefit, limited benefit, and voucher subtypes are used for discount type records.

item offer type.description: Offer type of item in the invoice.
item offer type.$comment: Present when item type is offer.

item summary.description: Detailed reference of the item type.

item description.description: Location provided description, or detailed reference of the item type.

item pricing strategy.$comment: Used in boarding, when daily and offer type is offer or room upgrade, then the item will be priced on the departure date.

item quantity.$comment: Offer and room upgrade are represented as 1, otherwise the quantity of the item purchased.

item pre discount subtotal.description: Pre discount subtotal of the item.

invoice-item-changes.description: Tracks individual invoice line item additions, modifications, or removals, including discounts and offers.

batch.description: Date of the data included in this batch.
batch.$comment: Batches are processed after the day ends at midnight, in the location’s local timezone. The first processed batch includes all historical data.

location.$comment: A human-readable, unique id for the location, using kebab case . This value is used externally, such as on booking websites. In rare cases it may change if there is business re-branding.

location timezone.$comment: Location's local timezone which can be used to convert UTC date-time properties.

account id.$comment: An account is the hierarchical parent of a location. In rare cases, the location-to-account relationship may change, such as when business ownership transfers.

invoice item pet created at.description: Timestamp of when the item-pet association was created.

invoice item pet updated at.description: Timestamp of when the item-pet association was updated.

invoice item id.$comment: Invoice item side of the item-pet association representing which invoice item is booked for a pet.

pet id.$comment: Pet side of the item-pet association representing which pet booked an invoice item.

invoice-item-pet-changes.description: Represents associations between invoice items and pets, identifying which pet each line item applies to.

batch.description: Date of the data included in this batch.
batch.$comment: Batches are processed after the day ends at midnight, in the location’s local timezone. The first processed batch includes all historical data.

location.$comment: A human-readable, unique id for the location, using kebab case . This value is used externally, such as on booking websites. In rare cases it may change if there is business re-branding.

location timezone.$comment: Location's local timezone which can be used to convert UTC date-time properties.

account id.$comment: An account is the hierarchical parent of a location. In rare cases, the location-to-account relationship may change, such as when business ownership transfers.

pet created location id.description: Location identifier (system) that created the pet.
pet created location id.$comment: The location that created the pet may be different from pet's location id when using shared-crm.

pet created at.description: Timestamp of when the pet was created.

pet updated at.description: Timestamp of when the pet was updated.

pet status.$comment: A deceased pet will be inactive.

pet weight.description: Numeric weight of the pet in pounds.

pet color.description: Description of the pet's color or appearance.

pet alert.description: Location generated content used to further describe the pet.

pet temper test results.description: Results of the pet's behavioral evaluation.

pet temper test date.description: Scheduled or completion date of the pet's behavioral evaluation.

pet temper test notes.description: Location generated description of the pet's behavioral evaluation.
examples: Teddy gets long well with other dogs, takes a while to warm up to new humans.

pet date of death.description: Date of death of the pet.

pet death recorded date.description: Date of recording for the pet's death.

pet death notes.description: Location generated description of the pet's death.

pet vet name.description: The name of the pet's veterinarian.

pet vet phone.description: The phone number of the pet's veterinarian.

pet species.$comment: Location configurable name for of one of Goose's supported species.

pet breed.$comment: Location's selection of a platform controlled list of breeds.

pet-changes.description: Reflects updates to pet profiles, including identifying details, temperament, species, and lifecycle events.

batch.description: Date of the data included in this batch.
batch.$comment: Batches are processed after the day ends at midnight, in the location’s local timezone. The first processed batch includes all historical data.

location.$comment: A human-readable, unique id for the location, using kebab case . This value is used externally, such as on booking websites. In rare cases it may change if there is business re-branding.

location timezone.$comment: Location's local timezone which can be used to convert UTC date-time properties.

account id.$comment: An account is the hierarchical parent of a location. In rare cases, the location-to-account relationship may change, such as when business ownership transfers.

pet owner created location id.description: Location identifier (system) that created the pet owner.
pet owner created location id.$comment: The location that created the pet owner may be different from pet owner's location id when using shared-crm.

pet owner created at.description: Timestamp of when the pet owner was created.

pet owner updated at.description: Timestamp of when the pet owner was updated.

pet owner status.description: Active status of the pet owner.

pet owner phone.description: Phone number of the pet owner.

pet owner first name.description: First name of the pet owner.

pet owner last name.description: Last name of the pet owner.

pet owner alert.description: Location generated content used to further describe the pet owner.

pet-owner-changes.description: Reflects modifications to pet records, including contact information, status, and ownership relationships.
